Name: Smokin' Hot Paloma
Ingredients: 45 ml Del Maguey Vida Clásico Mezcal
15 ml Giffard Piment d'Espelette chile liqueur
45 ml Thomas Henry Pink Grapefruit soda
Instructions: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with grapefruit soda.
Review: Mezcal provides a subtle hint of smokiness while chilli liqueur adds hot spice. The other guests to Paloma's party bring fruity honeyed sweetness.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2015 at Building on Bond in Brooklyn, NYC, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Smokin' Hot Paloma contains 195 calories
